33. (1) The regulatory body may determine that it is necessary to 
limit the right of access under Regulation 12(1) to passenger services

equilibrium of the public service contract or contracts in question.

be based on an objective economic analysis and pre-determined criteria.

(1) after a request for such determination received from any of the

capacity for the intended passenger service under Regulation 13(8).

paragraph (3) shall comply with a request by the regulatory body for

be compromised by the intended passenger service referred to Regulation 
13(8), it shall, in its notice of determination under paragraph (7), indicate 
possible changes to that service which would ensure that the conditions 
to grant the right of access provided for in Regulation 12 are met.”.
